# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for Responsive Maintenance Services

### RFSA Title:
* English: W3716-24ML03 - Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Montreal
* French: W3716-24ML03 - Services de maintenance réactifs - ALFC - Montréal

### RFSA Detail:

* **Publication Date:** November 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Description of Work:**
	+ The Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a contractor to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work.
* **Statement of Work:** Refer to Annex A for detailed requirements.
* **Teleconference:** An optional teleconference will be held on November 14, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in English and November 15, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in French.
* **Selection Criteria:** Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority, no later than November 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

### RFSA Details:
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
* **Procurement Method:** Open Bidding (Competitive)
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Goods and Services Description:** UNSPSC 40100000 - Heating, Ventilation, and Air Circulation.
* **Region of Opportunity:** Montreal
* **Regions of Delivery:** Montreal
* **Trade Agreements:** Subject to Canada's trade agreements with Chile, Europe, Panama, Ukraine, and others.

Please note that this RFSA is exempt from limited tendering.

**For more information, please visit:** [Notice URL in English/French]

Any questions or concerns can be directed to the Contracting Authority.
